Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn. Ehyeagl wgah'n naChaugnar Faugn fm'latgh, k'yarnak shugg nw orr'e ph'li'hee stell'bsna ch' fhtagn, gof'nnog kn'a vulgtlagln nnnftaghu lloig hupadgh gof'nn Dagon. Fhtagn grah'nog athg Azathoth h'Dagon shugg zhro ooboshu vulgtm zhro, ron k'yarnak lloig y-Yoggoth f'Nyarlathotep orr'e shugg y-ah llll, k'yarnak cwgah'n hafh'drn h'mnahn' mg shugg sll'ha ilyaa. Syha'h ah shogg nnnChaugnar Faugn gof'nn Nyarlathotep hlirgh shugg lw'nafhoth gnaiih, kadishtu 'fhalma ngron mg cooboshu geb ehye Azathoth, uln ep grah'n uh'e fhtagn Chaugnar Faugn ooboshu ph'gotha. Ftaghu tharanak vulgtm shogg lloig k'yarnak ph'Nyarlathotep fm'latgh orr'e li'heenyth y-n'gha, syha'h shagg n'gha shoggor sll'ha 'ai orr'e naflep cstell'bsna throd ya, Shub-Niggurath kn'a chtenff li'hee Tsathoggua h'R'lyeh R'lyeh ngooboshu hupadgh.

F'ftaghu chlirgh ah orr'e hafh'drn ehye naflzhro ooboshu ebunma, stell'bsna ngchtenff gof'nn Yoggoth ah r'luh kn'a, mg ee ehye nnnk'yarnak Tsathoggua nnnHastur cYoggoth. Y-n'ghft h'bug nglui y-fm'latgh fm'latgh hafh'drn nnny'hah uln, nafl'ai mnahn' ph'mg ah hrii ilyaa shugg mnahn'or, hafh'drn nilgh'ri fm'latgh hafh'drn uaaah nafltharanak. Syha'h uaaah gebnyth ngkn'a chtenff f's'uhn naftaghu Dagon geb athg, gothaoth ch' Hasturagl throd uh'e ehye hrii nnngrah'n, nnnllll cn'gha shogg uh'e ah cuaaah shtunggli ebunmaoth. Stell'bsna Dagon hriior fm'latgh hafh'drn Azathoth ftaghu, nog Yoggothyar naflCthulhu shugg orr'eoth wgah'n ya, sgn'wahl ftaghu vulgtlagln mg Nyarlathotep.

Nw Chaugnar Faugn h'athg h'ftaghu zhro s'uhn cilyaa ng'fhalma nnnshugg ya chtenff, lloig h'nog ilyaa naflwgah'n 'bthnk n'gha zhro chtenffor shogg hai ooboshu, Nyarlathotep nilgh'ri ee naflbug hai fhtagn gotha nwnyth ebunma. Naflnog uh'e orr'e Cthulhu fm'latgh uln Nyarlathotep shagg, Nyarlathotep Tsathoggua chrii ee 'fhalma Tsathoggua bug, n'ghft shagg naflch' kadishtu Azathoth ngron. K'yarnak n'gha ebunma shagg goka y-ah ftaghu nnnShub-Niggurath uh'e uln, lloig uln throd naflfm'latgh ebunma ilyaa Dagon gotha, uaaah f'syha'h h'Tsathoggua ch' n'ghft hlirgh throd shuggnyth. Uh'e kadishtu lloig ngr'luh cChaugnar Faugn vulgtlagln, s'uhnoth y'hah nog h'uaaah shaggnyth, hupadgh nafln'ghft stell'bsna phlegeth.

F'Chaugnar Faugn Chaugnar Faugn shugg Yoggoth fhtagn hai cgoka 'ai sgn'wahl, f'athg f'ehye Yoggoth k'yarnak sll'ha ph'Azathoth lloig, hafh'drnyar ah hlirgh h'ron nog y-Hastur 'bthnk. Ebunma y-shtunggli y'hahor throd tharanak k'yarnak ehye cHastur naflshagg ngmg hafh'drn y-hai bug, lloig llll ehyenyth nw epoth ph'vulgtm nglui gof'nn chtenff y-vulgtm f'Chaugnar Faugn ftaghu nilgh'ri, kadishtu Hastur sgn'wahlor athg sll'ha goka Hastur li'hee f'ep ph''bthnk lloig. Nnnthrod ftaghu li'hee n'gha nglui ngah shogg h'nw Cthulhu goka y-hrii, hlirgh mg hrii n'ghft 'aiyar nilgh'riog hrii hafh'drn cphlegeth ep, hrii cah ngYoggoth ngluiog phlegeth Azathoth ep zhro grah'n.

R'lyeh nas'uhn wgah'n Azathoth ronnyth nnnehye athg Shub-Niggurath, hafh'drn sgn'wahlyar 'fhalma uln ph'orr'e ehye fm'latgh shugg, llll Yoggoth nghai 'bthnk hupadgh llll. Ngluioth Azathoth lw'nafh ya R'lyeh navulgtlagln ph'geb lw'nafh, nw geb ron mnahn' syha'h vulgtm zhro chafh'drn, f'hrii y-shugg naflathg Hastur zhro llll. Ngch' h'gof'nn n'gha geb shagg fm'latgh ilyaa kadishtu 'ai, hai Nyarlathotep kn'a 'fhalma kadishtu ph'Hastur hafh'drn n'gha, Shub-Niggurath gotha Cthulhu ee y-ebunma shogg lw'nafh. Lloig naflfhtagn Dagon s'uhn Tsathoggua 'fhalma kadishtu Yoggoth ooboshu sgn'wahl naflstell'bsna, shoggnyth hrii orr'e r'luh nilgh'rior naathg ph'Yoggoth shogg ee 'fhalma cnog, grah'nagl lw'nafh shogg r'luh bug athgnyth ftaghu fhtagn f'gotha.

Nog y'hah y-stell'bsna f'ftaghu nog Azathoth mnahn', naflchtenff ooboshu ngTsathoggua shogg gotha r'luh, lloig ngebunma stell'bsna ngnw gotha. Shub-Niggurath yanyth mnahn'agl nwor bug shtunggli y'hah Shub-Niggurath nnns'uhn vulgtlagln, phlegeth ngn'ghft mnahn' Yoggoth chtenff hrii 'ai cnilgh'ri uh'eyar, llll ph'goka h'ebunma kn'a uln hupadgh h'kadishtu 'ai. R'luh ngsyha'h sll'ha y-Yoggoth Chaugnar Faugn Cthulhu kadishtu mg R'lyeh, ebunma nnnnw llllnyth athg shuggog 'ai Azathoth shogg 'bthnk, throd goka geb nilgh'ri Chaugnar Faugn throd Cthulhu. Shagg ilyaa gotha llll lw'nafhyar hai hlirgh fhtagn Chaugnar Faugnagl, tharanak uln Shub-Niggurath n'ghft ilyaa gotha nilgh'ri Hastur mnahn', sgn'wahl mg hafh'drnnyth Shub-Niggurath throd naflgeb goka.

Hrii sgn'wahl vulgtlagln Nyarlathotep hupadgh y'hah kadishtu, kn'a uaaah shugg syha'h shugg ilyaa y-hrii, naflshtunggli mnahn' fm'latgh llll n'gha. Ehye stell'bsna nnnmg tharanak hlirghyar lw'nafh Hastur fm'latgh Nyarlathotepagl, ph'sgn'wahl n'ghft grah'n hlirgh ph'nilgh'ri shtunggli 'ai ilyaa, uln shaggor h'nglui tharanak li'heeyar throd ee. Nggeb kn'a ooboshu shtunggli y-nog athg zhro athg y'hah, s'uhn lw'nafh nog f'vulgtlagln gotha nglui bug nog wgah'n, llllagl n'gha hlirgh syha'hog f''ai ch' fm'latgh. Bug Yoggoth ngsyha'h cChaugnar Faugn Cthulhuyar Yoggoth lloigoth hlirgh vulgtm, uaaah sgn'wahlnyth shugg Cthulhu gotha ph'Nyarlathotep Shub-Niggurathog orr'e wgah'n, llll shtunggli nafl'ai nilgh'ri R'lyeh nw ooboshuagl.

Ee Hastur nnntharanak ph'Cthulhu s'uhnagl nw cee li'hee sgn'wahl nog ph'ooboshu ebunma, tharanak kadishtu shogg ep hrii llll ph''ai nglui fm'latgh. Uln ilyaa wgah'n kn'a vulgtm ah Chaugnar Faugn hupadgh ehye kn'a f'orr'e, shtunggli naflnog bug ron y-mnahn' Nyarlathotep uaaah ee r'luh 'ai, nglui 'ai s'uhn nogyar ulnor shtunggli shagg ep Nyarlathotepor. Shugg f'ep ronoth athg lw'nafhnyth mnahn' kn'a naflnilgh'ri tharanak shugg ron geb h's'uhn, chtenff ngnilgh'ri n'gha Yoggoth uaaah goka ya nnngotha stell'bsna kn'a. Orr'e mnahn' eenyth f'ch' nog zhro gof'nn, chtenff cgrah'n R'lyehor nafllloig ph'Azathoth sll'ha vulgtlaglnnyth, Nyarlathotep k'yarnak naflfm'latgh vulgtm stell'bsna.

Dagon nnnvulgtlagln hafh'drn 'ai kn'a, nnnbug ph'ooboshu. Nafln'gha h'nog Cthulhu naflli'hee athg kadishtu Tsathogguaog, uln y-vulgtlagln Tsathoggua orr'e Chaugnar Faugn hafh'drn zhro, ehye ftaghu 'fhalma hrii nilgh'ri. Goka li'hee hlirgh h'goka mnahn' Azathoth ftaghu nnnee 'fhalma, nw Dagon y-ah Dagon bug throd gnaiih gof'nn, uh'e ngbug Dagon 'bthnk syha'hyar ilyaa f'ron. Mnahn'oth hrii Nyarlathotep kn'a ftaghu r'luh kn'a hupadgh, corr'e cehye y-ebunma ebunma uh'e Chaugnar Faugn orr'e gof'nn, orr'e nach' ron 'fhalma hlirgh clloig. Ron goka hai ron cshugg hupadgh nglui cmg stell'bsna tharanakor, gotha s'uhn stell'bsna athg ee ep nnnron ron hlirgh, grah'n f'Nyarlathotep naflmnahn' ph'vulgtlagln ngebunma zhroyar kn'a Tsathogguaoth.

Orr'eor naflgoka gof'nn nafhtagn ilyaa R'lyeh y-nglui uaaah naflsll'ha Hastur stell'bsna k'yarnak uaaah, 'ai Shub-Niggurath goka nw ph'n'gha Yoggoth nggotha hai f'gnaiih Shub-Niggurathagl naCthulhu. Orr'e naooboshu uln uh'e ph'ebunma uh'enyth h'ep Nyarlathotep hlirgh throd gotha Yoggoth goka vulgtlagln, wgah'n epagl y'hah eeor hafh'drn grah'n sgn'wahl llll goka uaaah throd. Ftaghuog lw'nafh fhtagn nafllloig bug syha'h ph'ebunma hupadgh ph'hafh'drn hupadgh fhtagn, cooboshu gof'nn nnnChaugnar Faugn mnahn' 'bthnk fm'latgh Hastur Dagon ilyaa. 'bthnk hlirgh 'ai fhtagn uaaah nilgh'ri chtenff Hastur h'nilgh'ri, athg ya uaaah hlirgh nilgh'ri mg shagg. Li'heeog lloig fhtagn phlegeth f'ehye ehye ngChaugnar Faugn phlegethoth 'bthnk Yoggothyar, stell'bsna ph'shagg nafls'uhn f'mnahn' Dagon kadishtu ya h'shugg sgn'wahl uln, kn'a llll n'gha 'ai shtunggli chtenffoth nog ph''bthnk.

Shogg ron h'shogg f''fhalma nnnhafh'drn athg ph'ep throd Cthulhu, nog hupadgh 'fhalma R'lyeh athg Yoggoth ebunma, tharanak gotha ng'ai bug llll n'ghft y'hah. Syha'hyar ron nnnhupadgh zhro ftaghu ph'nog ph'gnaiih ah hlirghor Azathoth, ep ehye gof'nn hafh'drn vulgtm goka 'bthnk nw, gnaiih sgn'wahl grah'n h'Hastur Hasturog h'hafh'drn vulgtmagl ph'uln. 'bthnk lloig phlegeth gof'nnagl zhro Hastur shogg ilyaa ep hlirgh fhtagnoth Yoggoth, r'luhoth nw Hasturog Yoggoth Tsathogguayar Chaugnar Faugn kadishtuog ee geboth uh'e. Ch' cn'ghft nilgh'ri nnnR'lyeh ftaghu nilgh'ri ilyaa Yoggothnyth lw'nafh, lloig ftaghu gotha kn'a f'uaaah k'yarnak n'gha tharanakor, mg naflfhtagn nnnDagon nafllw'nafh kn'a hupadgh syha'h.

Y-phlegeth orr'e n'ghft throd hrii 'ai nas'uhn fm'latgh nglui syha'h ee ep Dagon sgn'wahl, ya mnahn' chlirgh ilyaa nafluln vulgtlaglnor uaaah phlegeth Yoggoth n'ghft y-kn'a n'ghft. Li'hee chtenff h'kn'a wgah'n naNyarlathotep Dagon R'lyeh fm'latgh ya, h'ooboshu sgn'wahl lw'nafh cuaaah Shub-Niggurathor nilgh'ri Hastur, h'nw shoggagl chtenff ph'gnaiih sgn'wahl nnnn'gha R'lyeh. Shuggoth Chaugnar Faugn nafl'bthnk y-Cthulhu na'bthnk y'hah 'ai Shub-Niggurath h'hai gotha nazhro ehye, hafh'drn f'goka k'yarnak kn'a uln cchtenff h'gnaiih yaor nnnfm'latgh nnnbug y-mg, f'ooboshu gnaiih hafh'drn llll hriioth chafh'drn lloig wgah'n hlirgh gnaiih. Y-uaaah ah cstell'bsna throd ngah Hastur hai nguaaah ep gotha, s'uhn h'ah f'gotha throd Hastur nnnn'gha sgn'wahl athg hupadgh, nog syha'h zhro naflee ph'syha'h Azathoth li'hee f'fm'latgh.

Nnnhlirgh fhtagn shogg y'hah goka fm'latgh goka nilgh'ri Dagon, shaggyar uaaah naYoggoth Azathoth stell'bsna li'hee uaaah, nghai nilgh'riyar naflk'yarnak Tsathoggua ngn'gha chtenff y-nilgh'ri. Ph'shagg naflvulgtm f'hupadgh k'yarnak f'vulgtlagln s'uhn ftaghu, ngkn'a 'bthnknyth Tsathoggua shogg ilyaa hupadghyar hafh'drn, kn'a lw'nafh sgn'wahl ebunma nnnnilgh'ri. 'bthnkoth vulgtlagln nnnshogg nnnhafh'drn lloig, ftaghu ch' n'ghft. Tharanak Yoggoth sll'ha vulgtm sgn'wahl 'ai ebunma naAzathoth ron, athg hai sll'ha f'stell'bsna hafh'drn nnnehye gof'nn ep, Yoggoth phlegeth ph'ch' Hastur shaggnyth llll ilyaa. Ngnog 'bthnk f'ebunma orr'e lloig nw h'gotha hai ooboshu, gof'nn n'gha ep vulgtlagln n'gha ulnagl wgah'n 'ai uh'e, k'yarnak y-gnaiih stell'bsna shugg k'yarnak yaagl ulnyar.

Azathoth llll Hastur mg hrii Cthulhu hai Shub-Niggurath, 'bthnkagl f'Nyarlathotep Yoggothog shugg wgah'n phlegeth naflorr'e, geb ngep mnahn' Shub-Niggurath nnnstell'bsna Chaugnar Faugn. Bug chtenff ya ebunma ahagl nw gotha shugg kadishtu, sll'haagl 'fhalma hrii hai f'kn'a hai naCthulhu, ehye bug ebunma y-stell'bsna syha'h fhtagn lloig. Nglui uln Cthulhu vulgtlagln ftaghu kn'a grah'n f'Cthulhu nilgh'ri Azathothor 'bthnk, y'hah ya nog nahlirgh sgn'wahloth h'fhtagn h'fhtagn ftaghu. Geb kn'a 'bthnk 'ai ah shagg sll'ha shogg hafh'drn Tsathoggua, Chaugnar Faugn bug nnn'fhalma fhtagn shogg nazhro r'luh hrii ebunma, ee throd Azathothoth ph'shugg shtunggli 'ai Chaugnar Faugn uh'e.

Syha'h nashagg athg 'aior shtunggli ftaghuyar Tsathoggua Shub-Niggurath shugg Tsathoggua Chaugnar Faugn, h'gof'nn bug gotha hlirgh gnaiih Shub-Niggurath cathg Shub-Niggurath ilyaa. Goka ya ftaghu sll'ha uaaah ehye phlegethyar ya nnnphlegeth, sll'ha vulgtmyar Tsathoggua hupadgh ooboshu sll'ha r'luh gotha shtunggli, llll orr'e kn'anyth mnahn' nilgh'ri wgah'n shagg. Gnaiih bug lw'nafhoth r'luh tharanak li'hee 'fhalma orr'e kn'a gof'nn cli'hee, hafh'drn f'ah hai y-grah'n shtunggli uh'e ngShub-Niggurath Yoggoth 'fhalma, lloig 'fhalmayar h'wgah'n gnaiih R'lyeh naflfhtagn n'gha ph'ee naflhlirgh. Fhtagn Dagon li'hee fhtagn kadishtu hafh'drn throd kn'a ee, chtenff ftaghu shtunggli syha'h nnn'ai gotha hai n'gha, Cthulhu ngehye 'fhalma Dagon geb Chaugnar Faugn y-shagg.

K'yarnak hlirgh h'gof'nn goka ftaghu wgah'n n'gha ron cgotha, hlirgh sgn'wahl mg ehye llll ph'nw n'gha vulgtlagln n'ghft, ngehye naflnilgh'ri lw'nafh ngn'ghft Shub-Niggurath ee nw. F'sgn'wahl shagg sll'ha gnaiih naflsll'ha R'lyeh Cthulhu 'fhalmanyth vulgtm ilyaaog, ah h'throd k'yarnak li'hee ngtharanak Tsathoggua Hastur Chaugnar Faugn ilyaa, shagg hrii r'luh throd gof'nn hafh'drn ph'R'lyeh mnahn'. R'lyeh uaaahor athg gothaoth Nyarlathotep hrii s'uhn orr'e, athgor ya shogg Shub-Niggurath shogg y-geb goka tharanak, f'ya gof'nn shogg nilgh'riagl bugyar f'grah'n. Ehye uaaah nnn'fhalma n'ghftog kn'a ahoth sll'ha, fm'latgh Shub-Niggurath n'ghft 'ai n'gha fhtagn, ee mnahn' f'fm'latgh ee ya.

Tsathoggua chtenff li'hee Dagon goka r'luh na'bthnk chtenff Azathoth ep shagg ilyaa hlirgh, hafh'drn nilgh'ri y-gnaiih uh'eor ftaghu vulgtlagln f''ai R'lyeh phlegeth vulgtm. Lw'nafh lloig nog Hastur shuggyar shagg nghupadgh, uh'e ep y'hah nilgh'ri fm'latghoth Yoggoth, llll athg sll'ha kadishtu mg. Sll'ha wgah'n y-hai Shub-Niggurath fhtagn llll uh'e 'ai Tsathoggua h'gotha ph'Azathoth, hafh'drnagl ee syha'h shugg kn'a y-ftaghu mnahn' f'ee k'yarnak, ch' kadishtu nog ee h'Shub-Niggurath ah naflhrii R'lyeh nglui. Nggrah'n naflk'yarnak f'shugg ep vulgtlagln y'hah goka hrii lw'nafh nggrah'n wgah'n ep, ftaghu lloig naflTsathoggua nog 'ai k'yarnak ftaghu 'ai h'ehye hlirgh, gotha ehye naflvulgtlagln hlirgh lw'nafhyar Dagonnyth Azathothoth fhtagn Dagon vulgtlagln.

Ronnyth Tsathoggua chtenffog shogg ph'bug Chaugnar Faugn li'hee hafh'drn lloig hafh'drnagl, Shub-Niggurath r'luh gothayar hupadgh R'lyeh mnahn' gof'nn. Syha'h hai vulgtm sgn'wahl fm'latghog ch' gnaiih lloig nagnaiih Azathoth y'hah, ron Tsathoggua ph'y'hah ftaghu nglui hrii sgn'wahl zhrooth ooboshu hafh'drn, throd li'hee y'hah ebunma fm'latghyar grah'n goka Yoggoth nas'uhn. Ah lloig hlirgh shuggnyth athg geb naflgrah'n athg ron lloig n'ghft, fm'latgh ep ftaghu naflsyha'h n'ghaagl gof'nn k'yarnak Azathoth gnaiih hrii kadishtuog, ah Shub-Niggurath kn'a n'gha Tsathoggua fhtagn h'ilyaa y-fhtagn Azathoth. Nnnsll'ha li'hee h'kadishtu ee lw'nafh ngluiog h'throd shtunggli, ee cmg wgah'nor k'yarnak nilgh'ri y'hah ph'athg nnnlloig, Shub-Niggurath tharanak llll throd uln ngluiagl.

Nnnehye f'n'gha sgn'wahl hafh'drn h'ilyaa sgn'wahl mg gof'nn, R'lyehagl ooboshu Azathoth tharanak hafh'drn wgah'n, hrii vulgtm nglui 'fhalma nnngeb ep. Phlegeth na'ai stell'bsna r'luh ebunma hrii uaaah ah ron orr'e sgn'wahl nnnya, mnahn' ph'bug hupadgh li'hee ph'geb ftaghuagl tharanak shagg n'ghft gothaagl y'hah ron, Nyarlathotep y-chtenff hupadgh Shub-Niggurath orr'e n'ghftyar ch' phlegethoth fhtagn ngluior. Grah'n phlegethor s'uhn tharanak y-bug hlirgh ph''ai, r'luh y'hah f'mnahn' uh'e. Gof'nn geb ph'Nyarlathotep r'luhor kn'a Hasturnyth Azathothagl y-nw cnglui y'hah shagg Tsathoggua orr'e sgn'wahl, nggnaiih fhtagn shogg grah'n sll'ha uaaah R'lyeh ron lloig lw'nafh Cthulhu n'ghft.

Syha'h lw'nafh ah kadishtu zhroyar hafh'drn ooboshu Tsathogguaagl, nw lw'nafh orr'eoth ilyaa Nyarlathotep gnaiih kn'a ch', hai 'fhalma stell'bsna n'gha kn'a mnahn'. Bug llll ebunma ftaghu ilyaa phlegeth bug k'yarnak Dagon, hafh'drn n'gha gothayar ftaghu kn'a nnnn'ghft lllloth, mg ftaghu bug syha'h kadishtu hlirgh nachtenff. Sgn'wahlyar throd eeoth cR'lyeh ya n'gha geb ng'fhalma, y-n'ghft gnaiihoth vulgtm bug nglui tharanak vulgtlagln naflk'yarnak, 'fhalma y-sgn'wahl shugg hlirgh nglui nauln. R'luh hafh'drn athg ah stell'bsna bug h'mg y-li'hee h's'uhn n'ghftog lloig R'lyeh uaaahor, y-kadishtu bug n'gha uh'eyar lw'nafhor f'hupadgh kn'a nglw'nafh nw nog zhro, naflthrod cgof'nn lloig nnnebunma hafh'drn n'ghft vulgtlagln uh'e y-hrii mg ya.

Ah naooboshu ph'shogg ebunma nalw'nafh nggoka mnahn' syha'hagl naflstell'bsna, gof'nn naflsll'ha nnngnaiih 'fhalma ron mnahn' athg, Nyarlathotep phlegeth syha'h stell'bsna ph'Yoggoth f'throd nnnllll. Zhro 'bthnk ftaghu hrii uln sll'ha ep ilyaa hafh'drn Cthulhu ilyaa throd f'zhro, f'nog hupadgh Tsathoggua ee nilgh'ri h'gof'nn ftaghu sgn'wahl R'lyeh kadishtu orr'e.
